text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-12-1/" title="1 Corinthians 12:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Now concerning spiritual *gifts*, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-2/" title="1 Corinthians 12:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-3/" title="1 Corinthians 12:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and *that* no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-4/" title="1 Corinthians 12:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-5/" title="1 Corinthians 12:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-6/" title="1 Corinthians 12:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-7/" title="1 Corinthians 12:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-8/" title="1 Corinthians 12:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-9/" title="1 Corinthians 12:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-10/" title="1 Corinthians 12:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another *divers* kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-11/" title="1 Corinthians 12:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-12/" title="1 Corinthians 12:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also *is* Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-13/" title="1 Corinthians 12:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether *we be* Jews or Gentiles, whether *we be* bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-14/" title="1 Corinthians 12:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 For the body is not one member, but many.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-15/" title="1 Corinthians 12:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-16/" title="1 Corinthians 12:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-17/" title="1 Corinthians 12:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 If the whole body *were* an eye, where *were* the hearing? If the whole *were* hearing, where *were* the smelling?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-18/" title="1 Corinthians 12:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-19/" title="1 Corinthians 12:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And if they were all one member, where *were* the body?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-20/" title="1 Corinthians 12:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 But now *are they* many members, yet but one body.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-21/" title="1 Corinthians 12:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-22/" title="1 Corinthians 12:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-23/" title="1 Corinthians 12:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And those *members* of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely *parts* have more abundant comeliness.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-24/" title="1 Corinthians 12:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 For our comely *parts* have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that *part* which lacked:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-25/" title="1 Corinthians 12:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 That there should be no schism in the body; but *that* the members should have the same care one for another.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-26/" title="1 Corinthians 12:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-27/" title="1 Corinthians 12:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-28/" title="1 Corinthians 12:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-29/" title="1 Corinthians 12:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 *Are* all apostles? *are* all prophets? *are* all teachers? *are* all workers of miracles?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-30/" title="1 Corinthians 12:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-12-31/" title="1 Corinthians 12:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
